code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Quizzes=()=>{const quizzes=[{id:1,title:'JavaScript Quiz',description:'Test your JavaScript knowledge with fundamental concepts.',icon:'fab fa-js-square',color:'#F7DF1E',link:'#'},{id:2,title:'Web Dev Quiz',description:'Challenge yourself with HTML, CSS and web basics.',icon:'fas fa-code',color:'#6366f1',link:'#'},{id:3,title:'React Quiz',description:'Evaluate your understanding of React concepts.',icon:'fab fa-react',color:'#61DAFB',link:'#'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"quizzes",className:"quizzes-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Quizzes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"section-subtitle",children:"Test your knowledge"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"quizzes-grid",children:quizzes.map(quiz=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"quiz-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"quiz-icon",style:{color:quiz.color},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:quiz.icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:quiz.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:quiz.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:quiz.link,className:"quiz-link",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Start Quiz"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-arrow-right"})]})]},quiz.id))})]})});};export default Quizzes;
